{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = |caption2 = |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |brand = Proxim |model = Harmony 8450 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = |wlclass = A54 |series = |if = PCMCIA (32-bit) |if_bus_version = |ifconnector = |formfactor = |vendor_id = 168c |device_id = 0007 |subvendor_id = 1b47 |subdevice_id = 0110 |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = MHI-CAWCB500 |icid = |us_id = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = 00:06:80 |chip1 = Atheros;AR5210; |chip2 = Atheros;AR5110; |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = |antenna = |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = Card Access |manuf_model = CAWCB500 |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = a |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 10/15/2001 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = 743199101904 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B00006B63B |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = USA |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== Device is a [[Card Access CAWCB500]].. which is likely based on the [[Atheros AR5BCB-00013]] reference design. ===lspci -nnv dump=== 
06:00.0 Ethernet controller [0200]: Qualcomm Atheros AR5210 Wireless Network Adapter [AR5000 802.11a] [168c:0007] (rev 01)
        Subsystem: Numascale AS Skyline 4030 / Harmony 8450 802.11a Wireless CardBus Adapter [1b47:0110]
        Flags: bus master, medium devsel, latency 168, IRQ 19
        Memory at f1d00000 (32-bit, non-prefetchable) [size=64K]
        Capabilities: 
        Kernel driver in use: ath5k
===ath5k info dump=== 
ath: EEPROM regdomain: 0x10
ath: EEPROM indicates we should expect a direct regpair map
ath: Country alpha2 being used: CO
ath: Regpair used: 0x10
ath5k: phy5: Atheros AR5210 chip found (MAC: 0x5, PHY: 0x3)
ath5k: phy5: RF5110 5GHz radio found (0x3)
